entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as speaking kindly and reminding Kreacher that he didn't disobey orders.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is mentioned as shaking his head and rocking back and forth.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as asking Kreacher what happened when he got back.

entities.name: regulus
entities.description: Regulus is mentioned as being worried and telling Kreacher to stay hidden.

entities.name: the dark lord
entities.description: The Dark Lord is mentioned as the one who Kreacher went with to the cave.

relationships.description: Regulus told Kreacher to stay hidden and not to leave the house.
Regulus asked Kreacher to take him to the cave.
Kreacher went with the Dark Lord to the cave.
